pages.text: Move blocks and their tile entities through space itself. The Sigil of Transposition allows you to relocate blocks without breaking them, preserving their contents and state.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() 5000 per transposition$(br2)$(bold)Step 1:$() Right-click a block to select it as the source. The sigil will activate.$(br2)$(bold)Step 2:$() Right-click on another block's face to move the selected block adjacent to it.$(br2)$(bold)Clear:$() Right-click air to clear selection.

pages.title: Restrictions
pages.text: $(bold)Protection:$() Respects chunk protection (FTB Chunks, etc.)$(br2)$(bold)Relocation Tag:$() Cannot move blocks tagged $(#)forge:relocation_not_supported$()$(br2)$(bold)Destination:$() Target location must be air$(br2)The sigil will chunk-load the source area during transposition to ensure safety.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: Perfect for:$(li)Moving complex machinery$(li)Relocating filled chests$(li)Rearranging your base$(li)Moving spawners$(li)Transporting tile entities$(br2)$(italic)Beware: With great power comes great responsibility. Always verify you have permission before moving blocks.$()
